resources.string: This Chicago landmark is a sculpture where tourists from around the world come to take photos of their reflection.
This historic Chicago landmark is one of the oldest standing structures in its structure type.
It is often to referred to using a legume-themed name.

Cloud Gate is a sculpture created by Anish Kapoor, located in Chicago\'s Millennium Park. Its design was inspired by liquid mercury, and the surface of the sculpture reflects and distorts Chicago\'s skyline.
Wrigley Field opened in 1914, under the name Weeghman Park. The Wrigley Company purchased the Cubs in 1921 and renamed the stadium to Wrigley Field in 1927. Only Fenway Park is older.
Congratulations! You have solved the treasure hunt! Check out your time at the bottom of the screen!

In this treasure hunt, you will be presented with two clues, each with optional hints if you are stuck. Your task is to go to the location corresponding to each clue, and then click the \"Found It!\" button on that clue\'s page. Once you have successfully found the locations for both clues, you will have solved the treasure hunt! Act fast, because you will be timed! When you\'re ready, click the \"Start\" button.

This app requires location data to operate properly. Please click Confirm or Dismiss to close the app. If you want to use this app, please update your location services permission in the settings for this app.
You are at an incorrect location for this clue. Please try a different location. Click either \"Confirm\" or \"Dismiss\" to close this notification.
